table.name: analyst
table.remarks: Table containing list of analysts

column.name: active
column.remarks: Boolean column indicating whether the analyst is active or not.

table.name: announcement
table.remarks: Table to hold the announcement data

column.name: id
column.remarks: The unique id of the announcement data

column.name: ccbc_numbers
column.remarks: List of CCBC number of the projects included in announcement

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The json form data of the announcement form. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fannouncement.json)

table.name: application
table.remarks: Table containing the data associated with the CCBC respondents application

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key ID for the application

column.name: ccbc_number
column.remarks: Reference number assigned to the application

column.name: owner
column.remarks: The owner of the application, identified by its JWT sub

column.name: intake_id
column.remarks: The intake associated with the application, set when it is submitted

table.name: application_analyst_lead
table.remarks: Table containing the analyst lead for the given application

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: ID of the application this analyst lead belongs to

column.name: analyst_id
column.remarks: ID of the analyst this analyst lead belongs to

table.name: application_announcement
table.remarks: Table to pair an application to RFI data

column.name: announcement_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of a form

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of an application

column.name: is_primary
column.remarks: Flag to identify either announcement is primary or secondary

column.name: history_operation
column.remarks: Column describing the operation (created, updated, deleted) for context on the history page

table.name: application_community_progress_report_data
table.remarks: Table containing the Community Progress Report data for the given application

column.name: id
column.remarks: Unique ID for the Community Progress Report

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: ID of the application this Community Progress Report belongs to

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The due date, date received and the file information of the Community Progress Report Excel file

table.name: application_form_data
table.remarks: Table to pair an application to form data

column.name: form_data_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of a form

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of an application

table.name: application_gis_assessment_hh
table.remarks: Table containing data for the gis assessment hh numbers

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The application_id of the application this record is associated with

column.name: eligible_indigenous
column.remarks: The number of eligible indigenous households

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The data imported from the GIS data Excel file. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fapplication_gis_data.json)

table.name: application_package
table.remarks: Table containing the package the application is assigned to

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The application_id of the application this record is associated with

column.name: package
column.remarks: The package number the application is assigned to

table.name: application_rfi_data
table.remarks: Table to pair an application to RFI data

column.name: rfi_data_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of a form

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of an application

table.name: application_sow_data
table.remarks: Table containing the SoW data for the given application

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: ID of the application this SoW belongs to

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The data imported from the Excel filled by the respondent. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fapplication_sow_data.json)

column.name: is_amendment
column.remarks: Column identifying if the record is an amendment

table.name: application_status
table.remarks: Table containing information about possible application statuses

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: ID of the application this status belongs to

column.name: change_reason
column.remarks: Change reason for analyst status change

table.name: application_status_type
table.remarks: Table containing the different statuses that can be assigned to an application

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name of and primary key of the status of an application

column.name: visible_by_applicant
column.remarks: Boolean column used to differentiate internal/external status by indicating whether the status is visible to the applicant or not.

column.name: status_order
column.remarks: The logical order in which the status should be displayed.

column.name: visible_by_analyst
column.remarks: Boolean column used to differentiate internal/external status by indicating whether the status is visible to the analyst or not.

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The json form data of the assessment form. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fassessment_data.json)

table.name: assessment_type
table.remarks: Table containing the different assessment types that can be assigned to an assessment

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name of and primary key of the type of an assessment

table.name: attachment
table.remarks: Table containing information about uploaded attachments

column.name: file
column.remarks: Universally Unique ID for the attachment, created by the fastapi storage micro-service

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The id of the project (ccbc_public.application.id) that the attachment was uploaded to

column.name: application_status_id
column.remarks: The id of the application_status (ccbc_public.application_status.id) that the attachment references

table.name: ccbc_user
table.remarks: Table containing information about the application's users, this is business contact information not personally identifiable information

column.name: session_sub
column.remarks: Universally Unique ID for the user, defined by the single sign-on provider

table.name: change_request_data
table.remarks: Table to store change request data

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of an application

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The json form data of the change request form

table.name: conditional_approval_data
table.remarks: Table to store conditional approval data

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of an application

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The json form data of the conditional approval form. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fconditional_approval_data.json)

table.name: form
table.remarks: Table to hold the json_schema for forms

column.name: slug
column.remarks: The end url for the form data

column.name: json_schema
column.remarks: The JSON schema for the respective form

column.name: form_type
column.remarks: The type of form being stored

table.name: form_data
table.remarks: Table to hold applicant form data

column.name: id
column.remarks: The unique id of the form data

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The json form data of the project information form. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fform_data.json)

column.name: last_edited_page
column.remarks: Column saving the key of the last edited form page

column.name: form_data_status_type_id
column.remarks: Column referencing the form data status type, defaults to draft

column.name: reason_for_change
column.remarks: Column to track analysts reason for changing form data

table.name: form_data_status_type
table.remarks: The statuses applicable to a form

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of the status type

column.name: description
column.remarks: The description of the status type

table.name: form_type
table.remarks: Table containing the different types of forms used in the application

column.name: name
column.remarks: Primary key and unique identifier of the type of form

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the type of form

table.name: gapless_counter
table.remarks: Table to hold counter for creating gapless sequences

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key for the gapless counter

column.name: counter
column.remarks: Primary key for the gapless counter

table.name: gis_data
table.remarks: Table containing the uploaded GIS data in JSON format

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The data imported from the GIS data Excel file. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fgis_data.json)

table.name: history_item
table.remarks: This is a type used to return records of history data in the application_history computed column

column.name: record_id
column.remarks: Identifier that uniquely identifies a record by primary key [primary key + table_oid].

column.name: item
column.remarks: Main object affected by the operation (i.e. status, or file name or RFI type).

column.name: family_name
column.remarks: First Name of the user who performed the operation.

column.name: given_name
column.remarks: Last Name of the user who performed the operation.

column.name: session_sub
column.remarks: Session sub of the user who performed the operation.

table.name: intake
table.remarks: Table containing intake numbers and their respective open and closing dates

column.name: id
column.remarks: Unique ID for each intake number

column.name: open_timestamp
column.remarks: Open date and time for an intake number

column.name: close_timestamp
column.remarks: Close date and time for an intake number

column.name: ccbc_intake_number
column.remarks: Unique intake number for a set of CCBC IDs

column.name: application_number_seq_name
column.remarks: The name of the sequence used to generate CCBC ids. It is added via a trigger

column.name: counter_id
column.remarks: The counter_id used by the gapless_counter to generate a gapless intake id

table.name: project_information_data
table.remarks: Table to store project information data

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The foreign key of an application

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The json form data of the project information form. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fproject_information_data.json)

table.name: record_version
table.remarks: Table for tracking history records on tables that auditing is enabled on

column.name: record_id
column.remarks: The id of the record the history record is associated with

column.name: old_record_id
column.remarks: The id of the previous version of the record the history record is associated with

column.name: op
column.remarks: The operation performed on the record (created, updated, deleted)

column.name: ts
column.remarks: The timestamp of the history record

column.name: table_oid
column.remarks: The oid of the table the record is associated with

column.name: table_schema
column.remarks: The schema of the table the record is associated with

column.name: table_name
column.remarks: The name of the table the record is associated with

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: The user that created the record

column.name: created_at
column.remarks: The timestamp of when the record was created

column.name: old_record
column.remarks: The previous version of the record in JSON format

table.name: rfi_data
table.remarks: Table to hold RFI form data

column.name: id
column.remarks: The unique id of the form data

column.name: rfi_number
column.remarks: Reference number assigned to the RFI

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The json form data of the RFI information form. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Frfi_data.json)

column.name: rfi_data_status_type_id
column.remarks: Column referencing the form data status type, defaults to draft

table.name: rfi_data_status_type
table.remarks: The statuses applicable to an RFI

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of the status type

column.name: description
column.remarks: The description of the status type

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The data imported from the Excel filled by the respondent. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fsow_tab_1.json)

table.name: sow_tab_2
table.remarks: Table containing the detailed budget data for the given SoW

column.name: id
column.remarks: Unique ID for the SoW detailed budget record

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The data imported from the Excel filled by the respondent. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fsow_tab_2.json)

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The data imported from the Excel filled by the respondent. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fsow_tab_7.json)

table.name: sow_tab_8
table.remarks: Table containing the detailed budget data for the given SoW

column.name: id
column.remarks: Unique ID for the SoW Tab 8

column.name: json_data
column.remarks: The data imported from the Excel filled by the respondent. See [schema](https://json-schema.app/view/%23?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbcgov.github.io%2FCONN-CCBC-portal%2Fschemaspy%2Fdata%2Fsow_tab_8.json)
